data.name: Siberian Dawn Mission Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Overview


Mission Pack 1 gives you the full Core game of Siberian Dawn, adding 9 new Units to the Union Bloc and 9 new Units to the Guild Bloc, along with the Bond system. Mission Pack 1 also includes the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story, multi Objective Missions that greatly expand on what was introduced in the Training Run Mission in the base game.


Additions


New Union Units – 9 new Union Units join the Grunt to be recruited in the 3 new Missions.
New Guild Units – 9 new Guild Units covering the 4 Guilds of the Union now join the Scribe.
Bond System – Pick 1 of 4 Bonds to give you a unique link to a specific Guild in Missions.
More Tactics – New Tactics cards to cover the new Union Units, increasing tactical options.
New Missions – 3 New Missions with multiple Objectives and a greater challenge.


Mission 1-1 Anarchy Rising


Mobs are gathering in Industrial Habitation IH-54 and anarchy threatens to destroy its productivity. Outcasts are rumoured to have been stirring up this dissent and it is believed they are connected to a cult called the Dawn. You must quell any hostile forces and remove the individuals that are fuelling this danger to our Union.

Mission 1-2 Grey Shadows


As the turmoil increases in IH-54 an informant has told us about a disillusioned leader of this revolt. He says this leader has vital information about what the Dawn cultists are really doing in IH-54. The informant demands a bribe to contact the leader but we do not know what the leader will demand.

Mission 1-3 Lost Souls


The data given by Stoenza shows Dawn cultists are holding several members of the Letalis Guild captive. We know the location they are being held in but not where they are being held inside the building. Find and rescue these captives before the Dawn can complete the dark plans they have for them.


Your Challenge


The Dawn is coming and it all starts here with Mission Pack 1. Have you got what it takes to face the challenges threatening Industrial Habitation IH-54? Uncover the secrets that built our Union before they can tear it all apart. Use your skills as an Overseer to save us all.

data.short_description: Mission Pack 1 gives you the full Core game of Siberian Dawn, adding 9 new Units to the Union Bloc and 9 new Units to the Guild Bloc, along with the Bond system. Mission Pack 1 also includes the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story. The full Siberian Dawn Core experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 800
